priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire PHQ-9 Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C103481

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire PHQ-9 Test Code Terminology

name: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 Item Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PHQ-9 Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 Item Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Little interest or pleasure in doing things.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Little Interest or Pleasure in Doing Things

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Feeling Down, Depressed, or Hopeless

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Trouble Falling or Staying Asleep, or Sleeping Too Much

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Feeling tired or having little energy.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Feeling Tired or Having Little Energy

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Poor appetite or overeating.
Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down.
Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television.

Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Moving or Speaking Slowly or the Opposite being Fidgety or Restless

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - Thoughts That You Would be Better Off Dead
synonyms: PHQ01-Thoughts You Be Better Off Dead

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 9 - If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-9 - How Difficult have Problems Made it for You to Work, Take Care of Things, or Get Along with Other People
